content: Is there a way to output a lean file to md, pdf or html with some commenting conventions like in Coq (with coqdoc), to create sections, subsections etc?
There is an old hack at https://leanprover-community.github.io/format_lean/ and newer work with the Lean version of https://github.com/cpitclaudel/alectryon/
Arthur Paulino has marked this topic as resolved.
